Job Description Arm’s Strategic Alliances team develops deep and expansive relationships with partners companies. In this role you will work with worldwide companies that develop highly influential software and/or platforms that are essential in enabling our ecosystems across mobile, internet of things and infrastructure markets. In this role, you get the opportunity to own both the business and technical engagements with strategically important companies to ensure that their products are optimized for deployment on Arm devices. Our strategic team also has the responsibility for looking for ways to develop potential commercial relationships with the partner companies, either through direct or indirect channels. You will look for creative ways to grow the value chain. You will navigate to and maintain relationships with C-suite level executives. Additionally, you will collaborate across our lines of businesses to build solutions while working with our partners to identify and further market opportunities.When you join the team, you report to the VP of Strategic Alliances and take responsibility for the definition, articulation and execution of customized, strategic programs with strategic companies. You manage the relationships and business development activities with the partners, develop business with them, and ensure that our engineering and business teams understand the partners’ strategies and technology needs and roadmaps.What will you be accountable for?Lead the partner relationships and handle Arm’s activities and interactions with them.
